column2: Fined for blaming carbon tax for price rises
column4:
In August 2012 the ACCC issued a $6600 infringement notice to the Genesis Fitness Club, Berwick. Part of the Belgravia Health and Leisure, a division of Belgravia Group Pty Ltd, the Club had fraudulently claimed that the carbon tax was responsible for increasing gym membership fees by 9-15%.
[Source 2012][More on Governance]
